str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; a separatist, i.e. Exclusively religious; a Pharisean, i.e. Jewish sectary.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To hear, listen, comprehend by hearing; pass: is heard, reported. A primary verb; to hear.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To muzzle, silence. From phimos; to muzzle.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from Sadok; a Sadducaean, or follower of a certain heretical Israelite.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From sun and ago; to lead together, i.e. Collect or convene; specially, to entertain.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
